member.name: T:OrchardCore.Liquid.LiquidContentAccessor
member.summary: This is a placeholder class that allows modules to extend the `Content` property in the current Liquid scope.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Liquid.LiquidPropertyAccessor
member.summary:
Can be used to provide a factory to return a value based on a property name that is unknown at registration time.
e.g. {{ LiquidPropertyAccessor.MyPropertyName }} (MyPropertyName will be passed as the identifier argument to the factory)
